computeOneSolution

public boolean[] computeOneSolution(boolean[] rightSide)
Returns only one solution, so does not need to make a long list of solutions. The independent fields are set zero.

Parameters:
rightSide - vector b of the equality Ax=b.
Returns:
one solution.

sumMatrices

public static BooleanMatrix sumMatrices(java.util.List<BooleanMatrix> matrices)
calculates in every entry the sum of the corresponding entries in the given matrices. Please only call this method if you have checked that all matrices have the same dimension.

Parameters:
matrices - list of matrices.
Returns:
sum of the matrices, entry-wise in F_2.

isLinearIndependent

public static boolean isLinearIndependent(java.util.List<boolean[]> list)
Checks a list of vectors for linear independence. They are linear dependent if there is a non-trivial linear combination giving zero. This check writes all vectors as a matrix and makes a Gauss-elimination.

Parameters:
list - list of vectors which shall be checks for linear independence. All vectors must have the same length.
Returns:
whether the given vectors are linear independent.

sumTwoVectors

public static boolean[] sumTwoVectors(boolean[] applyTo,
                                      boolean[] applyTo2)
Calculates the sum of two vectors in F_2.

Parameters:
applyTo - first vector.
applyTo2 - second vector.
Returns:
the sum of both vectors.

sumVectors

public static boolean[] sumVectors(java.util.List<boolean[]> vectors)
Calculates the sum of arbitrary many vectors in F2, they must have the same length and must be one ore more.

Parameters:
vectors - the list of vectors where the sum shall be calculated.
Returns:
the sum of the given vectors.

computeKernelBase

public java.util.List<boolean[]> computeKernelBase()
Calculates a base of the kernel space.

Returns:
a list of base elements of the kernel space.

computeAllKernel

public java.util.LinkedList<boolean[]> computeAllKernel()
Computes all elements of the kernel, not only a linear independent base. It works by calculating linear combinations of the basic kernel elements.

Returns:
a list of all kernel elements.

allLinearCombinations

protected static java.util.LinkedList<boolean[]> allLinearCombinations(java.util.List<boolean[]> basics)
Calculates all possible linear combinations of the list of basic elements.

Parameters:
basics - basic elements which shall be combined.
Returns:
a list of all possible linear combinations with the basic elements.

Returns:
